tool.name: In-Silico Labeling - Training

param.name: dataset_train_path
param.label: Specify path for the dataset, where the images to be analyzed are at.

param.name: checkpoint_path
param.label: Specify path for the checkpoints, where the Training model checkpoints are at.

param.name: output_path
param.label: Specify path for the output, where the predicted images will be saved at.

param.name: till_step
param.label: Specify the final step of training you want the training to go on.
param.help: It will train for an additional steps till it reaches the number you specify!

tool.help: Exports the Base Directory, and then Runs the prediction for the image folder.
